md:
giải nghĩa từ "braver" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Braver (adjective)

* Meaning: Showing courage or strength in the face of danger or difficulty.
* Vietnamese: Dũng cảm, can đảm.

Example sentence: "The firefighters were braver than anyone else in the face of the raging fire."

* Related words: brave, bravery, fearless, courageous.

Braver (comparative form of "brave")

* Meaning: More courageous or showing more strength in the face of danger or difficulty.
* Vietnamese: Dũng cảm hơn, can đảm hơn.

Example sentence: "She was braver than her brother when it came to trying new things."

* Related words: brave, bravery, fearless, courageous.
